H0.text: In which American state is Camp David, the mountain retreat of the President of the U.S.A.. Virginia

H1.text: In which American state is Camp David, the mountain retreat of the President of the U.S.A.. Colorado

H2.text: In which American state is Camp David, the mountain retreat of the President of the U.S.A.. California

H3.text: In which American state is Camp David, the mountain retreat of the President of the U.S.A.. US-MD

A4.text: It lies in the wooded hills of Catoctin Mountain Park, in Frederick County, Maryland, near the towns of Thurmont and Emmitsburg, about 62 miles (100 kilometers) north-northwest of the national capital city, Washington, D.C.
